name: Magic Chess 3D Game
description:
Classics always works its magic – play Magic Chess 3D on your device!
Take part in the intellectual duel of wizards;
Lead your magic chess army to the victory;
Use various strategies to win the game;
Win this fascinating magic challenge!

Magic Chess 3D is far from being a boring chess game. It transforms your usual game of chess into a breath-taking clash of two magic armies. Outwit AI and lead your army to the victory!

- Classic rules, classy appearance;
- Epic collision of two eternal enemies;
- Advanced chess AI as a virtual rival;
- Test different grand master combinations.
